function.name: get_ticketmaster_event_details
function.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific event using the Ticketmaster Discovery API (v2 /events/{id} endpoint). Provide an event ID to get event name, date, time, venue, city, state, price range, info, notes, and a Ticketmaster URL. See https://developer.ticketmaster.com/products-and-docs/apis/discovery-api/v2/#event-details-v2 for full details.
